title: Jennifer Lawrence marries Cooke Maroney at glitzy Hollywood wedding in Rhode Island
text:

Jennifer Lawrence has married her fiance Cooke Maroney at a glitzy Hollywood wedding in Rhode Island.

The actress, 29, and her partner, 34, tied the knot at a lavish mansion in Newport in front of celebrity guests including Adele, Cameron Diaz and Sienna Miller.

Other guests at the bash included Kardashian matriarch Kris Jenner, comedienne Amy Schumer, actress Emma Stone and fashion designer Ashley Olsen.

According to People.com , the bride wore a Dior dress.

The wedding took place at Belcourt Castle on Saturday evening and was following by a reception there that night.

Security was high throughout the day as tall fences were erected around the building along with fake hedges and black out screens.

Huge crowds turned out and lined the streets in a bid to get a glimpse of the couple and their famous guests.

(Image: Richard Harbus / MEGA)

(Image: T.JACKSON / BACKGRID)

Pictures of the big day show Sienna Miller arriving in a red ball gown, while Kris Jenner was seen looking chic in black and Emma Stone opted for a grey velvet coat.

At the start of the bash, guests were reportedly treated to cocktails before the ceremony.

Afterwards there is believed to have been a second cocktail reception followed by dinner and dancing with music from a live band.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Guests got together on Friday night for a clam bake ahead of the couple's big day

The dream wedding venue has a minimum cost of $100 per head, and pictures from inside show lavish table decorations, and elegant flowers.

The owner of the property, Carolyn Rafaelian, spoke to the New York Times in 2013 about having the place cleansed of evil spirits.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: PA Wire/PA Images)

She even had a shaman come in and perform ceremonies in the building to rid it of ghosts.

"There were energies and entities, some not pleasant", she said.

"We did a major cleansing, energy-wise. There was a lot of heaviness, but we took care of that.

"Now the house has a different vibration."

Jennifer and Cooke were first spotted together in June 2018, and announced their engagement in February this year.

(Image: Elder Ordonez / SplashNews.com)
